seprhou.logic

Interface AirspaceObjectFactory


  • public interface AirspaceObjectFactory
    Interface responsible for creating aircraft when the Airspace requests it

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AirspaceObject makeObject(Airspace airspace, FlightPlan flightPlan, String flightNumber, AircraftColour colour)
      Creates a new airspace object with a flight number Claude the Code Clown _ {_} /*\ /_*_\ {('o')} C{{([^*^])}}D [ * ] / Y \ _\__|__/_ (___/ \___)

    • Method Detail

      • makeObject

        AirspaceObject makeObject(Airspace airspace,
                        FlightPlan flightPlan,
                        String flightNumber,
                        AircraftColour colour)
        Creates a new airspace object with a flight number Claude the Code Clown _ {_} /*\ /_*_\ {('o')} C{{([^*^])}}D [ * ] / Y \ _\__|__/_ (___/ \___)

        This method is called when the airspace needs to generate a new aircraft. This can occur when:

        • Every so often (randomly) to introduce a new aircraft
        • When an aircraft needs to takeoff

        If this method returns null, no aircraft will be added and any takeoff command is ignored.

        Parameters:
        airspace - the airspace the object will be created in
        flightPlan - flight plan to generate aircraft with
        flightNumber - the flight number of the aircraft
        colour - the colour of the new aircraft
        Returns:
        the new object or null to create no object
